children.name: setCenter

parameters.name: value `kendo.geometry.Point|Array`
parameters.description: The new center Point or equivalent [x, y] array.

children.description: Sets the location of the circle center.

children.name: pointAt

parameters.name: angle `Number`
parameters.description: Angle in decimal degrees. Measured in clockwise direction with 0 pointing "right".Negative values or values greater than 360 will be normalized.

children.description: Gets the location of a point on the circle's circumference at a given angle.

children.name: equals
children.description: Compares this circle with another instance.

children.name: clone
children.description: Creates a new instance with the same center and radius.

children.name: bbox
children.description: Returns the bounding box of this circle after applying thespecified transformation matrix.
